column4: has anyone an idea whats meant by following failure: ohci_hcd *numbers* unlink after no irq? different acpi or apic settings may help
this message always appears if i plugin a usb device (mouse, wlanstick, keyboard)
apic and acpi options are set via kernel boot parameters. Edit the #kopts line in /boot/grub/menu.lst, adding e.g. "noapic". Then run update-grub and reboot.
